name: Quick Meatball Stroganoff
author: Barbara Miller
summary: This is a recipe I came up because my family loves stroganoff. It was a hit with everyone.
ingredients: 8 ounces broad egg white noodles (such as No Yolks®)
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
15  frozen beef meatballs, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add noodles and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, 10 to 12 minutes
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Add onion and garlic; cook and stir until onion is almost soft, about 3 minutes
Reduce heat to medium and pour in cream of mushroom soup, milk, and Worcestershire sauce; stir until blended
Reduce heat to low and simmer, covered, until tender, 35 to 40 minutes
Stir in sour cream, salt, and pepper
Cook until flavors combine, about 2 minutes
